channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Silicon Valley Is All About the Hard Sell These Days
item.description: Sam Altman’s appearance on The Tonight Show is part of a larger charm offensive currently being waged by the tech establishment.

item.title: Coreweave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
item.description: The CEO of the AI data center provider, which has Nvidia as an investor and a supplier, described the environment as a "violent change" in demand.

item.title: Think AI actions in Windows 11 are pointless? Microsoft is letting you banish them from the right-click menu
item.description: Windows 11 will soon have tidier right-click menus by allowing AI actions to be fully removed from File Explorer.

item.title: Unconventional AI confirms its massive $475M seed round
item.description: Led by Naveen Rao, the former head of AI at Databricks, the new hardware startup is valued at $4.5 billion.

item.title: Call of Duty won’t release Modern Warfare or Black Ops back to back anymore
item.description: Future Call of Duty releases will no longer include back-to-back launches of Modern Warfare or Black Ops games, Activision announced on Tuesday. The past four releases in the series have been Modern Warfare II (2022), Modern Warfare III (2023), Black Ops 6 (2024), and Black Ops 7 (2025), but moving forward, Activision wants to offer […]

item.title: This Is the Best Razor I've Ever Used—Save Big With This Sale
item.description: Henson Razors are engineered to give a spectacular shave with dirt-cheap generic blades.

item.title: Hinge CEO steps down to launch Overtone, an AI dating app
item.description: Overtone is described as "an early-stage dating service focused on using AI and voice tools to help people connect in a more thoughtful and personal way."

item.title: Your Favorite Social Media Psycho Is Back in Killer Sequel ‘Influencers’
item.description: Kurtis David Harder’s follow-up to his 2022 horror hit stars Cassandra Naud as a shifty, seductive, tech-savvy villain.

item.title: Plus d’autonomie et logo illuminé : l’Opel Astra électrique corrige sa copie pour affronter la Mégane E-Tech et la Peugeot 308
item.description: Cousine technique de la Peugeot e-308, la carrière de l'Opel Astra électrique est plutôt confidentielle en France. En Europe, elle séduit un peu plus, et elle profite de sa mi-carrière pour s'offrir une petite cure de jouvence à la fois esthétique et technique.
